resources.string: One man with courage makes a majority.\n -Andrew Jackson
Not failure, but low aim, is the crime.\n -Unknown
Hard work beats talent when talent does not work hard. \n- Tim Notke
Do the best you can. No one can do more than that.\n -John Wooden
Champions keep playing until they get it right.\n -Billie Jean King
Opportunities donâ€™t happen, you create them.\n -Chris Grosser
The bad news is time flies. The good news is you are the pilot.\n -Michael Altshuler
Believe you can and you are halfway there.\n- Theodore Roosevelt
Success usually comes to those who are too busy looking for it.\n -Henry David Thoreau
I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.\n -Estee Lauder
Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.\n -W. P. Kinsella
